## Your First Map

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat=39.2980803, lng=-76.5898801,
            popup="Jeff Leek's Office")
my_map
```

### Adding many markers

```{r}
set.seed(2019-08-26)
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, min = 39.2, max = 39.3),
                 lng = runif(20, min = -76.6, max = -76.5))
df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers()
```
